import CryptoJS from'crypto-js';const secretKey=process.env.REACT_APP_SECRET_KEY;export const encryptToken=token=>{return CryptoJS.AES.encrypt(token,secretKey).toString();};export const decryptToken=encryptedToken=>{const bytes=CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(encryptedToken,secretKey);return bytes.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8);};export function getDateFromTimestamp(timestamp){const date=new Date(timestamp);const day=date.getDate();const month=date.getMonth()+1;// Tháng trong JavaScript bắt đầu từ 0, nên cần +1
const year=date.getFullYear();return"".concat(day,"/").concat(month,"/").concat(year);}export function formatBytes(bytes){if(bytes===0)return'0 Bytes';const k=1024;const sizes=['Bytes','KB','MB','GB','TB'];const i=Math.floor(Math.log(bytes)/Math.log(k));return parseFloat((bytes/Math.pow(k,i)).toFixed(2))+' '+sizes[i];}
